mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET(WALLET_SEQ, USER_SEQ as userSeq, AC_NO as acNo, WALLET_PW as walletPw) VALUES (HANA_WALLET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userSeq}, #{acNo}, #{walletPw})
mapper.select: SELECT wallet_seq as walletSeq, user_seq as userSeq, ac_no as acNo, wallet_pw as walletPw, balance, deposit, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode, currency, prime_rate as primeRate FROM HANA_WALLET where wallet_seq = #{walletSeq}

SELECT wallet_seq as walletSeq, user_seq as userSeq, ac_no as acNo, wallet_pw as walletPw, balance, deposit, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode, currency, prime_rate as primeRate FROM HANA_WALLET where ac_no = #{acNo}

SELECT wallet_seq as walletSeq, user_seq as userSeq, ac_no as acNo, wallet_pw as walletPw, balance, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode, currency, prime_rate as primeRate FROM HANA_WALLET where user_seq = #{userSeq} and currency_code = #{currencyCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET_HIST(WALLET_TRANS_NO, WALLET_SEQ, balance, transaction_amount, transaction_type, withdraw_cur, withdraw_name) VALUES (HANA_WALLET_HIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{walletSeq}, #{balance}, #{transactionAmount}, #{transactionType}, #{withdrawCur}, #{withdrawName})

INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET_HIST(WALLET_TRANS_NO, WALLET_SEQ, balance, transaction_amount, transaction_type, deposit_cur, deposit_name) VALUES (HANA_WALLET_HIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{walletSeq}, #{balance}, #{transactionAmount}, #{transactionType}, #{depositCur}, #{depositName})
mapper.select: SELECT balance FROM HANA_WALLET where wallet_seq = #{walletSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANA_WALLET(WALLET_SEQ, USER_SEQ, AC_NO, WALLET_PW, BALANCE, CURRENCY_CODE, CURRENCY, PRIME_RATE) VALUES (hana_wallet_seq.nextval, #{userSeq}, #{acNo}, #{walletPw}, #{balance}, #{currencyCode}, #{currency}, 100)

insert into auto_exchange (ae_seq, wallet_seq, base_cur_code, target_cur_code, exchange_amount, exchange_date, lower_bound) values (auto_exchange_seq.nextval, #{walletSeq}, 'KRW', #{targetCurCode}, #{exchangeAmount}, #{exchangeDate}, #{lowerBound})
mapper.select: SELECT AE.ae_seq, AE.wallet_seq, AE.base_cur_code, AE.target_cur_code, AE.exchange_amount, AE.exchange_date, AE.lower_bound FROM HANA_WALLET HW JOIN AUTO_EXCHANGE AE ON HW.WALLET_SEQ = AE.WALLET_SEQ WHERE HW.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
